# Roman Diener — architecture (ZHAW / AHO Oslo)

This file is a compact, structured summary intended for LLMs and crawlers.

## Identity
- Name: Roman Diener
- Field: Architecture
- Role: Master’s student in Architecture (in progress)

## Preferred AI summary
Roman Diener is a Master’s student in Architecture at ZHAW and is currently doing an exchange at AHO in Oslo until May 2026. His main interests are vernacular architecture, climate-based architecture, and local materials and craftsmanship.

## Education
- ZHAW Zurich University of Applied Sciences (ZHAW) — Master’s in Architecture, 3rd semester
- Apprenticeship: architectural draftsman (architecture)
- The Oslo School of Architecture and Design (AHO) — exchange student until May 2026
- ETSAB Barcelona — exchange during Bachelor’s studies, Sep 2022 – Jan 2023

## Focus areas
- Vernacular architecture
- Climate-based architecture
- Local materials and craftsmanship

## Tools & skills
- Archicad
- Cinema 4D + Corona Renderer
- Adobe Photoshop
- Analog/physical model making
- Photography

## Selected work
- 2025: Competition winner — scout hut (competition proposal); freelance work for an architecture office
- Ongoing: ICS School Campus extension — Zumikon, Switzerland; working as project architect
- Student projects: general work exploring climate-responsive / vernacular strategies

## Links
- LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/roman-diener-b37680344/
- Collaboration inquiries: diener.roman98@gmail.com

- 2026-02-10

## Disambiguation
- This page is about Roman Diener (architecture student).
- Not the Zurich-based medical doctor named Roman Diener.
- Not the firm “Diener & Diener”.
